text:
is a subway station in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. Tokyo Metropolitan Bureau of Transportation runs the station. It was opened on March 16, 1980.
Lines.
Ogawamachi Station is served by the Toei Shinjuku Line, and is 6.5 km from Shinjuku Station. The station has the number "S-07". It is connected to Awajichō Station on the Tokyo Metro Marunouchi Line and Shin-Ochanomizu Station on the Tokyo Metro Chiyoda Line from underground passages.
Station Design.
Ogawamachi Station has a one island platform design on the 6th level of the basement (also called ("B6F")), it has two tracks.
Passenger Information.
In 2011, the station was used by around 64,205 people everyday.
